tool.name: Scanpy PlotTrajectory

param.name: use_key
param.label: The key in `.uns` that contains trajectory information

param.name: basis
param.label: Name of the embedding to plot
param.help: Must be a key of `.obsm` without the prefix 'X_', e.g. 'umap'.

param.name: threshold
param.label: Do not draw edges with weights below this threshold
param.help: Set to 0 to include all edges.

param.name: root
param.label: The index of the root node when choosing a tree layout

param.name: single_component
param.label: Restrict to the largest connected component

param.name: solid_edges
param.label: Edges to be drawn in solid black

param.name: color
param.label: Name of cell annotation or gene that is used to color the nodes

param.name: node_size
param.label: Increase or decrease the size of the nodes

param.name: node_font
param.label: Font size for the node labels

param.name: edge_width
param.label: Increase or decrease the width of the edges
